MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Sql.MigrationStatement> Generate (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Model.MigrationOperation> migrationOperations, string providerManifestToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Sql.MigrationStatement> Generate(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Model.MigrationOperation> migrationOperations, string providerManifestToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Generate (migrationOperations As IEnumerable(Of MigrationOperation), providerManifestToken As String) As IEnumerable(Of MigrationStatement)

Docs.param: The operations to be converted.
Token representing the version of SQL Server being targeted (i.e. "2005", "2008").
Docs.summary: Converts a set of migration operations into Microsoft SQL Server specific SQL.
Docs.returns: A list of SQL statements to be executed to perform the migration operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void Statement(class System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Utilities.IndentedTextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The writer containing the SQL to be executed.
Docs.summary: Adds a new Statement to be executed against the database.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void Statement (string sql, bool suppressTransaction = false);
.method familyhidebysig instance void Statement(string sql, bool suppressTransaction) cil managed
Protected Sub Statement (sql As String, Optional suppressTransaction As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: The statement to be executed.

Gets or sets a value indicating whether this statement should be performed outside of the transaction scope that is used to make the migration process transactional. If set to true, this operation will not be rolled back if the migration process fails.
Docs.summary: Adds a new Statement to be executed against the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig class System.Data.Entity.Migrations.Utilities.IndentedTextWriter Writer() cil managed
Protected Shared Function Writer () As IndentedTextWriter

Docs.summary:
Gets a new that can be used to build SQL.
This is just a helper method to create a writer. Writing to the writer will not cause SQL to be registered for execution. You must pass the generated SQL to the Statement method.
Docs.returns: An empty text writer to use for SQL generation.
